resources.string: This is the main screen of the app at startup with 4 explicit intents for each category! It contains 1 ImageView and 4 TextViews.

This is the songs screen of the app opened from an explicit intent in MainActivity! You can go back through the back button in action bar. It contains 2 Badges and 2 TextViews to represent a hypothetical list of songs. You can click on a song to open the media player screen.

This is the albums screen of the app opened from an explicit intent in MainActivity! You can go back through the back button in action bar. It contains 2 Badges and 2 TextViews to represent a hypothetical list of albums.

This is the artists screen of the app opened from an explicit intent in MainActivity! You can go back through the back button in action bar. It contains 2 Badges and 2 TextViews to represent a hypothetical list of artists.

This is the playlist screen of the app opened from an explicit intent in MainActivity! You can go back through the back button in action bar. It contains 2 Badges and 2 TextViews to represent a hypothetical list of playlist. You can click on a playlist to open the media player screen.
This is the now playing screen of the app! You can go back through the back button in action bar. It will be used ExoPlayer library to implement the Media player functionality.
